page.title: 19CARING FOR THE COMMUNITY 2
page.content: The staff of the Community action Project are employed to provide services to youth, the disabled, the elderly and voluntary groups. Amongst its youth work, the Project assists at evening youth clubs, arranges trips and plays a large part in running playschemes in the school holidays. The majority of the staff are employed caring for the disabled and elderly. Regular visits are made to such people, advice and help is given on welfare benefits and other financial matters, gardens are kept under control and essential painting and decorating undertaken. Local groups are able to call on the Project to make photographic or video records of events, provide low cost printing services and publicity in the Projects monthly newsletter.
